snippet: In Barbados, Andrew Branch, who has quadriplegic cerebral palsy, went to the museum and the zoo; in Brooklyn, he is more or less trapped in his apartment.
abstract: Brooklyn Community Services secures money for Andrew Branch, who has quadriplegic cerebral palsy,  to file a citizenship application that will allow him to obtain services from the United Cerebral Palsy like work-readiness and residential programs.
lead_paragraph: In Barbados, Andrew Branch, who has quadriplegic cerebral palsy, went to the museum and the zoo; in Brooklyn, he is more or less trapped in his apartment.

headline.seo: Stuck on 2nd Floor, Daydreaming of Going Outside
